name: @mgvdev/ai
description: CLI to generate AI rule documentation and wire it into AGENTS.md or CLAUDE.md

scripts.publish:npm: bun run test && bun run build && npm publish
scripts.publish:npm:dry: bun run test && bun run build && npm publish --dry-run
scripts.release:patch: npm version patch && bun run publish:npm
scripts.release:minor: npm version minor && bun run publish:npm
scripts.release:major: npm version major && bun run publish:npm
